gui.form.base

Class DropDownMenu<T extends Displayable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.form.base.FormObject
      • gui.form.base.ListBox<MenuItem>
        • gui.form.base.DropDownMenu<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChangeSubject, FormObjectWithChildren, java.lang.Comparable<FormObject>

    public class DropDownMenu<T extends Displayable>
extends ListBox<MenuItem>
    A class of DropDownMenus, extending a listbox, but being able to be disabled.
